errors.error_description: The instructions for running tests have the commands in the wrong logical order; one must change into the project directory *before* running the test command from a relative path.
correction_candidates:
cd to elife-bot and execute:
python -m pytest --junitxml=build/junit.xml tests/
From the parent directory, execute: python -m pytest --junitxml=elife-bot/build/junit.xml elife-bot/tests/
First cd to the tests/ directory, then run: python -m pytest --junitxml=../build/junit.xml
Run the test command from within the elife-bot directory.
errors.golden_answer:
cd to elife-bot and execute:
python -m pytest --junitxml=build/junit.xml tests/

errors.error_description: The command to run a starter uses incorrect syntax (`--pythonpath .`) for setting the PYTHONPATH environment variable.
